attributes.comment:
My experience show that we have hidden costs that are not shown on this.
Example Cost of the Application for I-131, then laters years in the embassy we
have to paid the cost of the visa (two o three times more by person $365) and in
our case in Honduras we had to paid the cost of the ADN (Around $900). Then
these costs are not show in the cost of the process.

At the same time looks like the personnel selected in this Agency has some in
common "No good matters to work with the customer", we the US Citizen and/or
Taxpayers.

Improving IT systems using good personnel will reduce your costs.

Thanks

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Oscar R. Pereira
